entry.title: East African Mounted Rifles (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that during the First World War the East African Mounted Rifles (pictured) sometimes painted stripes on their horses to camouflage them as zebras?

entry.title: Kiriko (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Kiriko, a "fox girl" character for Overwatch 2, was teased through a coded message that translates to "What Does the Fox Say?"

entry.title: the second season (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that William Hartnell was the only original Doctor Who cast member who remained by the end of the second season?

entry.title: First National Bank Tower (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the First National Bank Tower, standing at 634 feet (193 meters), is the tallest building in the state of Nebraska?

entry.title: Roger Robinson (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that New Zealand academic and runner Roger Robinson has continued competing in races into his 80s despite knee replacement surgery in both knees?

entry.title: Michigan banner (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Michigan banner survived an attack by uniformed men from Ohio during the Ten Year War?

entry.title: two Europeans convicted in 1918 after the death of a black man (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the lenient sentencing of two Europeans convicted in 1918 after the death of a black man in the East Africa Protectorate led to inquiries from the British Colonial Office?

entry.title: kebab pizzas (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in 2021, two Swedish prison inmates took correctional officers as hostages, demanding twenty kebab pizzas?
